listitem.para: [renodr] - Modified the install command for gnome-settings-daemon. Fixes #10827.
[renodr] - Added note to gnome-color-manager about build failing with docbook-utils installed. Fixes #10828.
[renodr] - Modified sassc build instructions to work correctly with downloaded tarball. Fixes #10829.
[renodr] - Fix build failure with gtk-doc installed in gcr. Fixes #10826.

[ken] - Remove obsolete text from valgrind re symlinking ld-linux to a .dbg version of ld. In April 2017 LFS changed the strip commands. That file now only contains debug symbols and is loaded when needed: making the symlink breaks the system. Remove related text from curl.
[ken] - Update to xkeyboard-config-2.24 with xkbcomp-1.4.2 (Xorg app). Fixes #10852 and #10858.
[ken] - Update to firefox-61.0. Stylo is no-longer optional, therefore Clang is now required. Fixes #10898.
[ken] - Add libssh2 which is sometimes required during the install of rust. Fixes #10880.
[ken] - Update to (intel) microcode-20180425 (this only affects some Broadwell E machines (previous microcode withdrawn) and Gemini Lake Pentium/Celeron (new microcode). Fixes #10844.
[ken] - Fix inkscape for changes in poppler-0.65.0.
[ken] - Fix vlc build for QT-5.11 API changes.
[bdubbs] - Update to gstreamer-1.14.1 and plugins. Fixes #10787.
[bdubbs] - Ensure references to freetype2-config are correct. Fixes #10789.
[ken] - Wget can use libidn2, not libidn.
[bdubbs] - Fix failures with xfwm and xorg-xerver-1.20.0. Fixes #10772.
[dj] - Added header seds from LFS for systemd-238.
[bdubbs] - Update to libfm and libfm-extra-1.3.0.2. Fixes #10716.
[bdubbs] - Archive qtwebkit and do not build kdewebkit. Fixes #10615.
[pierre] - Fix building Apache-Maven with Java 10. Fixes #10771.
[ken] - Fix building transcode and libquicktime with ffmpeg-4.0 (new patches, extra switch in ffmpeg). Fixes #10735 and #10761.
[pierre] - fix building nasm with gcc-8.1. Report by Thanos Baloukas.
[bdubbs] - Add a patch to xf86-video-vmware for gcc8 and xorg-server-1.20.0 changes.
[ken] - change gentoo ftp repo to one which still works. Fixes #10736.
[ken] - webkitgtk: demote enchant to recommended. Fixes #10745.
[ken] - gvfs: move libsecret and libsoup2 to required. Fixes #10744.
[ken] - Update to gimp-2.10.0 and gegl-0.4.0, with libmypaint-1.3.0 and mypaint-brushes-1.3.0. Fixes #10711 and #10708.
[ken] - Update to texlive-20180414 and 2018 install-tl-unx. Fixes #10712.

[ken] - Update external perl modules used by biber for changed dependencies as at 30th April (File::Copy::Recursive now uses Test::Warnings instead of Test::Warn, DateTime::Locale adds IPC::System::Simple).
[ken] - Patch firefox-59.0.2 to work with ffmpeg-4.0.0.
[ken] - Patch libreoffice-6.0.1.1 to build with poppler-0.64.0.
[ken] - Patch inkscape to build with poppler-0.64.0.
[pierre] - gptfdisk-1.0.3 has usable tests. Add them.
[pierre] - Update convenience patch for gptfdisk-1.0.3: the ICU switch is not needed, and the POPT switch is superfluous. Only the install target is kept.
[bdubbs] - Update to polkit-0.114. Archived js38. Fixes #10662.

[ken] Fixes for problems people have encountered with my rustc instructions. In particular, in llvm add -DLLVM_LINK_LLVM_DYLIB=ON which I have been using for ages but was not in the current book, and in rustc add RUSTFLAGS to ensure that libffi is linked. Also simplify the rustc install. Particular thanks to 'balducci' for the RUSTFLAGS.
[ken] - Update to rustc-1.25.0 (will be needed when firefox-60 is used). Fixes #10624.
[ken] - Thunderbird requires gtk2 as well as gtk3. Reported by 'rhubarbpieguy'.
[timtas] - Update to alsa-1.1.6 (alsa-lib, alsa-plugins, alsa-utils,alsa-tools, ALSA OSS). Fixes #10623.
[bdubbs] - Start obexd on bluez page. Fixes #10614.
[ken] - Work around missing quotes in c_rehash from openssl-1.1.0h so that make-ca will work again. Fixes #10626.

[bdubbs] - Update to gnome-apps-2.28 baobab cheese eog evince file-roller gnome-calculator gnome-color-manager gnome-disk-utility gnome-logs gnome-maps gnome-system-monitor gnome-terminal. Fixes #10525.
[pierre] - Move Little-CMS2 to recommended dependency of poppler, since cups-filters needs it.
[pierre] - Move Linux-PAM to recommended dependency of cups, since upstream will make it required in a forthcoming version.
[pierre] - Update to icu-61.1. Add a switch to allow building libreoffice with this version of icu. Fixes #10581.
[bdubbs] - Update to GNOME platform packages gnome-control-center gnome-shell gnome-shell-extensions gnome-user-docs mutter gdm gnome-session and epiphany. #10502.

[bdubbs] - Update to GNOME platform packages gcr, gjs, gnome-backgrounds, gnome-bluetooth, gnome-desktop, gnome-keyring, gnome-online-accounts, gnome-settings-daemon, gsettings-desktop-schemas, libgweather, libsecret, nautilus, yelp-xsl, and zenity. Partially fixes #10502.
[bdubbs] - Use LWP::Protocol::https for ntp dependency. Fixes #10570.
[pierre] - Samba: promote libtirpc to required, and pass -ltirpc to LDFLAGS instead of CFLAGS.
[pierre] - Reinstate autotools build in glib-2.56.0: meson build is not ready yet.
[timtas] - Add rpcsvc-proto as a required dependency of samba, as reported by Ryan Marsaw.
[timtas] - Update to gstreamer-1.14.0 (including updates to gstreamer-vaapi gst-libav gst-plugins-base gst-plugins-good gst-plugins-bad gst-plugins-ugly). Fixes #10561.
[ken] - Fixes in firefox: the icon location changed in firefox-59, and the old text about using configure --help has been wrong since firefox-58 required ./mach. Thanks to Wayne for the report.
[pierre] - Update to Junit-4.12 (using maven for building). Fixes #10422.
[timtas] - Add libnsl as a required dependency of vsftpd.
[bdubbs] - Added rpcsvc-proto as a required dependency of autofs. Fixes #10512.
[bdubbs] - Update to at-spi2-core-2.28.0 and at-spi2-atk-2.26.2. Fixes #10520.

[pierre] - Move the instructions to install the CA certificates for Java to "Configuring the Java environment", so that a "cacerts" file can be passed to OpenJDK's configure. Also host the jtreg bundle on anduin.

[ken] - Update intel microcode to 20180312 (spectre v2 mitigation for SandyBridge and later). Please note that for some models, particularly Skylake, currently-available kernels may disregard the mitigation because of issues with the previous (now withdrawn) version. That will hopefully be fixed in a few days, but will then require a kernel upgrade. Fixes #10300.
[timtas] - Explain how to build network-manager-applet without gobject-introspection and gtk-doc.
[bdubbs] - Update to xinit-1.4.0 and 12 Xorg apps. Fixes #10501.
[ken] - Update to firefox-59.0 (security fix). Fixes #10507. Please note that the libraries are now installed in an unversioned /usr/lib/firefox/ directory.
[pierre] - Update configuration instructions for OpenLDAP: Mention the new slapd-config method, and account for possibly removed .la files in the module directory.
[pierre] - New Xorg protocols bundle xorgproto-2018.4. Remove the previous page. Thanks to Ken for help. Fixes #10347.
